rules_text: [i]Hate[/i] – At the beginning of each combat, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you may return up to one target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control with a finality counter. It gains lifelink and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
